Effect - Class in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi
A local interface for an Aurora effect.
Effect() - Constructor for class io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.Effect
Creates a blank effect.
Effect.Direction - Enum in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi
The available effect direction types.
Note: If a direction is missing, please create an issue on Github.
Effect.Type - Enum in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi
The availbale effect types.
Note: The plugin type is for user-made plugin effect types.
EffectBuilder - Interface in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.effectbuilder
The EffectBuilder model for the six primary Aurora effect types.
effects() - Method in class io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.Aurora
